transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji mam, mai Sujit Mandal bol raha hu.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: IndiaMART. Hello, ji mai Sujit Mandal bol raha hu mam.
Executive: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Mam, thoda sa mujhe queries tha apne app pe hu app pe mujhe kaise quotation ye karna hai uske liye mujhe thoda janna tha.
Executive: Sujit sir, Anju baat kar rahi hu aapke account manager.
Customer: Ji mam, aapka number mam ye jis number se aap baat kar rahe the us number se to aap se mai call kar raha tha lag nahi raha tha mam.
Executive: Sir mujhe waise to mera number chalu hi hai aur by chance ho sakta hai ki aapne call kiya ho aur us time mera call kya pata koi dusri call pe ho us wajah se.
Customer: Ye ye ye ye aapka number hai mam isi number ko save karo aap.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi sir ye number nahi hai mera. Thik hai mai aapko apna number se ek bar whatsapp pe hello message drop kar deti hu aap mera number save kijiye sir koi bhi query hoti hai aap mujhe direct call kijiye na.
Customer: Thik hai mam us mai aapko mai kar raha tha jis number se aap karte the pehle us number se nahi ho raha tha mam lag nahi raha tha isliye.
Executive: Pata nahi sir mere paas koi call aayi nahi waise keh rahe aapki aur dusra matlab by chance kabhi aisa raha kare to ek bar whatsapp se connect kar liya karo kyuki whatsapp pe to hamesha hi active rehte hai.
Customer: Aap number aap number bol dijiye na mam ek bar.
Executive: Mai number mai aapko whatsapp hi kar deti hu abhi hello message drop kar deti hu then aap save kar lena thik hai. Ab bataiye quotation kaise banana hai ye janna hai.
Customer: Thik mam.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Aap mobile par ho abhi ya desktop par ho?
Customer: Mobile se mobile se mam.
Executive: Thik hai ek bar buylead wale page par aao.
Customer: Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai mam buylead pe hu mam.
Executive: Thik hai right hand side pe upar ki taraf dekhiye three dots wala option aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi lead manager pe jana hai na mam pehle.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi.
Executive: Accha ha ek bar lead manager me jaiye ha.
Customer: PDF quotation lead manager me.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji mam lead manager me.
Executive: Thik hai yaha pe dekhiye kisi bhi ek inquiry ko open kijiye.
Customer: Ek minute. Mai example ke liye bata rahi hu fir aap jis bhi inquiry pe quotation banana chahte hai usi inquiry ko khol ke bana sakte hai. Abhi ek example ke liye koi bhi inquiry kholiye jab open kar lenge to fir right hand side pe upar three dots ke sign dikhai denge aapko.
Customer: Nahi mam buylead bhi to nahi aa raha hai abhi to mam manage quotation buylead to dikh nahi raha mam wo option.
Executive: Lead manager lead manager.
Executive: Lead manager me nahi dikh raha hai aapko wo option?
Customer: Lead manager me hu mam lead manager me jaake fir waha par.
Executive: Mai ek kam kar leti hu hum video meeting pe connect kar lete hai mai aapko easily guide kar paungi aap bhi samajh payenge kaha pe option dikhega.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai ho gaya mam ho gaya samajh gaya mam.
Customer: Abhi ye jo PDF quotation jo aaya.
Executive: Haan exactly right.
Executive: PDF quotation ko open karenge waha pe step by step jo jo cheeze puchi ja rahi hai product ka naam daliye uska price daliye hai na image wagera apne aap hi capture kar lega wo and then fir next karenge to fir baki ki cheeze jo jo puchi ja rahi hai wo sab fill karte chaliye then last me aa jayega PDF quotation banane ka option bas wo bana ke fir buyer ko send kar dena.
Customer: Nahi nahi isme jaise abhi isme title dalna hai na mam title me dala hua hai isme next karna hai isme.
Executive: Haan?
Customer: Title daal ke.
Customer: Discount percent dena hai mam isme.
Executive: Ab wo aapki choice hai sir agar aap discount dena chahte hai lagana cha rahe hai product pe price pe to lagaiye nahi lagana hai to rehne dijiye.
Customer: Ye ye mam isme to jaise pehla hai back karne dijiye isme pehla jo hai isme jo hai abhi maine iska jo quotation sheet ka mai quotation de raha hu isko mai select kiya hu.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Aur uske baad next kar raha hu uske baad fir discount de raha fir applicable taxes hai. Shipping charges hai delivery period hai five days aur additional details isme kya dalna hai mam?
Executive: Additional detail me isme jo hai isme price kaha aa raha hai mam price to dikh hi nahi raha kaha par dalna hai uska.
Executive: Price automatic pakad lega na sir wo kyuki aapne product me dekho aapke catalog me jo product add hai wo automatic hi capture hua hai to wahi se price bhi capture ho jayega.
Customer: Agar mai discount nahi nahi dena chahta to usko lead usko blank chhod du mai.
Executive: Haan haan bilkul blank chhod sakte hai.
Customer: Thik hai.
Customer: Applicable taxes.
Executive: Bataiye bataiye aap pura bana lijiye mai call pe hi hu agar dikkat aayegi to at least mai help kar paungi aapki.
Customer: Thik hai mam thik hai.
Executive: Haan mai line pe hu.
Customer: Isme additional detail me kya dalna padta hai mam?
Executive: Wo jaise ki aapki koi terms and conditions hai to aap add kar sakte ho suppose 50% advance bata sakte hai buyer ko to wo aap additional detail me dal sakte ho.
Customer: Thik hai mam.
Customer: Ab PNS number kya hota hai mam isme?
Executive: Hello haan ji sir haan ji sir.
Customer: PNS number ye PNS number kya PNS number dikh raha hai wo kya cheez ke liye hai?
Executive: Wo aapka PNS number hota hai maine aapko bataya nahi tha jo buyer aapko call karta hai aapke catalog pe number dikhai deta hai na ki IndiaMART virtual number provide karta hai aapko to PNS number wahi hota hai.
Customer: Ye ye virtual number IndiaMART ki taraf se hai na mam ji sir ji haan.
Executive: Buyer se call karta hai to aapke jo bhi number usme map hai do number map kar rakhe hai aapne to us number se agar agar koi koi agar buyer is number se call kare to mere ko mere paas aayega sir mam.
Executive: Bilkul aayega bilkul aayega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Virtual number ka aapko buyer call karega jitne number aapke map hai un sab pe ring ek sath bajegi to wo fir aapko screen pe dikhai dega lekin screen pe aapko buyer ka real number nahi dikhega wo bhi ek virtual number hi dikhega wo number maine aapko add bhi karwaya tha IndiaMART buyer ke naam se wo save tha na aapke paas.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Haan usi number se call aati hai.
Customer: Thik hai mam thik hai.
Executive: Ho gaya sir bani quotation?
Customer: Thik hai thik hai. PDF generate ho gaya? Abhi mam usko preview me check kar raha hu kaise quotation banana hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Thik hai mam bana raha thoda. Thik hai. Ye clarity hai na isme aap koi confusion to nahi aap bana payenge na?
Customer: Nahi nahi bilkul bilkul bana paunga.
Executive: Thik hai by chance agar koi dikkat lage to fir direct mujhe connect kar sakte hai aap aur ek cheez aur bataiye sir jo direct matlab buyleads wagera bhi kaisi aa rahi hai kya scenario chal raha hai?
Customer: Buyleads ka mam abhi mam do teen din se thoda sa mai jyada busy ho gaya tha mai le nahi paya tha to abhi mai consume kar raha hu aaj do teen consume kiya hu mai aaj.
Executive: Thik hai. Ab consume karte chaliye do teen din se nahi aap consume kar pa rahe the it's okay but usse pehle jitni bhi leads aapne consume kari hai unke feedbacks kaise hai?
Customer: Abhi abhi dikat ye hai wo price pe matlab wo bid nahi ho pa raha price to wo log agree nahi ho pa rahe.
Executive: Lekin requirement to match ho rahi hai na?
Customer: Haan requirement match ho rahi hai requirement match ho rahi hai unke requirement tha wo match ho rahi hai lekin price pe abhi bhi thoda sa wo log jyada ye kar rahe hai mam abhi.
Executive: Buyer to karta hi hai aur ye aapki call rahegi hamesha ki price aap kis tarike se buyer ko offer kar rahe hai hai na to koi nahi ye to follow up cases ho gaye sir ye jitne jyada follow up aur aap karenge price me kaise convince karenge wo aap hi ki call rahegi hai na thik hai ye wale cases bhi aage chal ke convert honge sir aur koshish kijiye jaldi se jaldi convert ho to aapko bhi at least maturity milna shuru ho jaye right.
Customer: Thik hai ji thik hai.
Executive: Haan aur direct inquiry and calls wagera sab okay chal rahi hai sir unme koi problem to nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi koi problem nahi hai free hoga to mai call karunga mam.
Executive: Haan definitely sir definitely baki jo bhi calls wagera aati rahe unhe receive karte rahiye ga thodi calls aapki miss bhi hui hai sir beech me hi mai in November ki hi baat hai sir to maine aapko pehle bhi iske bare me jankari di thi char call aapke paas total aayi hai November me usme se teen call aapki miss hui hai ek hi receive ho paayi hai to please isko thoda sa control kijiye sari calls ko receive kijiye thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai mam thik hai.
Executive: Aur review ratings bhi lete rahiye ga sir jo bhi customer ke sath deal kar rahe hai quotation aap bana ke bhej rahe hai hope so ye convert agar ho jata hai to review ratings bhi lena jaruri hai abhi kyuki catalog pe zero hai.
Customer: Review ratings kaise denge mam uska link kaise bhejenge review rating?
Executive: Jaise jaise isi inquiry pe aake jaha se aapne three dot pe click karke PDF wala option nikala hai na wahi pe ek ask for review ka bhi option aa raha hoga to isi person ko isi inquiry ko ask for review pe click karke bhej doge to ek link chala jayega buyer ke paas wo use open karke aapko review rating de sakta hai aap use call karke bol bhi dena sir maine ek link share kiya hai review rating ke liye to please aap ek share kar do apna ratings wagera.
Customer: Thik hai mam thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai haan to ye bhi lene aa sakte hai thik hai sir. Thik hai chaliye ek ek ek cheez aur thi Sujit sir abhi aapne na ye customer care number pe 9696 number jo hamara hai us pe call kiya hai to ye aapka side se concern khul gaya hai concern open ho gaya hai filhal mai isko close kar deti hu aur aapke paas ek mail par mere behavior and resolution ke liye feedback mail aayega to usko aap waha pe satisfied ya yes ka option hoga aap us pe click kar dijiyega thik hai sir.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai okay.
Executive: Hmm thik hai sir okay thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed help creating quotations on the app.

- Customer was unable to connect with executive earlier.

- Customer is not getting expected price for buyleads.

- Customer wants to know about PNS number.



Resolution:

- Executive provided guidance on creating quotations.

- Executive shared her WhatsApp number.

- Executive explained the PNS number.

- Executive shared tips on how to convince buyers.

- Executive asked to receive all calls.

- Executive explained how to get review ratings.

- Executive informed about feedback mail.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will create quotation and contact if needed.

- Customer will provide feedback on the mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, quotation, pns number, review ratings
